attributes.action: Reintroduce Rationing whilst we are all effected by the Coronavirus Pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Repeated Government and Supermarket requests not to panic buy and not to stockpile have been ignored. There is nothing to prevent selfish people going from one shop to the next getting the maximum at each one. The Government could set up an online scheme using people’s National Insurance numbers and any dependent children could also be added and this information would be required at the checkout to complete the purchase. It may be time consuming but everyone will have what they need.
attributes.background: Reintroduce WW2 style rationing whilst we are all effected by the Coronavirus Pandemic.
